creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

ULQ: [ 淇堂洗研墨方薫几下爐香又一焚信筆為吾諫逸気或成飛瀑或成雲　中島桒太長兄咲正 ] (In my studio I grind the ink until it is fragrant, / And burn an aromatic oil lamp beneath my table. / Trusting my brush to sketch as it will, / I urge on an untrammeled spirit, / Perhaps depicting a flying waterfall, / perhaps creating clouds.) (SA)
markings: ULQ, rectangular intaglio; UL edge, square intaglio; UL edge, square intaglio and relief combination; LRC, square relief
title: Landscape for Nakajima
